mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jk_loan_repay_record
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT record.id AS recordId,limit.loan_receipt_id AS LoanNo,product.`name` AS productType,record.amount AS repayAmount,date_format(record.create_time, '%Y/%m/%d') AS repayDate FROM jk_loan_repay_record record,jk_loan_limit `limit`,jk_loan_product product WHERE record.loan_limit_id=`limit`.id AND `limit`.product_id=product.id AND record.uid=${uid} ORDER BY record.create_time

SELECT CONCAT('Â¥',record.amount) AS amount,date_format(record.create_time, '%Y/%m/%d') AS repayTime,plan.delay_status AS `status`,plan.period_number AS periodNumber,temp.CODE_NAME AS statusDescribe FROM jk_loan_repay_record record LEFT JOIN jk_loan_repay_plan plan ON record.repay_plan_id=plan.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jk_code WHERE CODE_KEY='${repayDelayStatus}') temp ON plan.delay_status=temp.CODE_NO WHERE record.loan_limit_id=${loanLimitId} ORDER BY record.create_time

SELECT record.id AS recordId,limit.loan_receipt_id AS LoanNo,product.`name` AS productType,record.amount AS repayAmount,date_format(record.create_time, '%Y/%m/%d') AS repayDate ,apply.order_no as orderNo FROM jk_loan_repay_record record,jk_loan_limit `limit`,jk_loan_product product,jk_loan_apply apply WHERE record.loan_limit_id=`limit`.id AND `limit`.product_id=product.id AND record.loan_apply_id= apply.id AND record.loan_apply_id=${loanApplyId} ORDER BY record.create_time
